text: Michael Andrew Weinberg (born February 16 1993) is an American former child actor. He starred in Home Alone 4 as Kevin McCallister.Filmography IMDb He is the younger brother of Matt Weinberg. ==Movies== Year Movie Role Notes 2001 Life as a House Adam 2002 Home Alone 4: Taking Back the House Kevin McCallister TV movie Stolen Summer Danny Jacobsen ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:1993 births Category:Living people
title: Mike Weinberg
